text: Japan participated and hosted the 1986 Asian Winter Games held in Sapporo, Hokkaidō, Japan from March 1 to March 8, 1986. This country garnered 29 gold medals securing its top spot in the medal tally.OCA 1986 Winter Asiad medal tally ==Participation details== ===Medal table=== :This table is incomplete.
